{"step_by_step_thinking": "The walking and stepping reflex is present at birth but disappears around 2 months of age. The limb placement reflex also disappears as the baby grows. The parachute reflex, however, appears at around 6-9 months and never disappears as it is important for protecting a person from falling. Therefore, the parachute reflex is the reflex that never disappears.", "answer_choice": "C"}
